message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I think we can be a bit fairer than that. How about this?
You didn't like my first offer, so I'll try again, a bit more for me this time
This is getting us nowhere. How about we meet in the middle?
You're losing value, I'm not. Take this before it gets worse for you
Okay, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the only fair option here.
Your 50/50 is not fair considering inflation, I'll take more
This is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than I would get, even with the inflation. Take it or leave it.
You're desperate, I'll take advantage of that
Alright, this is my final offer. It's more than generous considering the inflation, but I'd rather get this over with than risk getting nothing. Don't be greedy, Alice.
You're running out of time, I'm taking more
